pyttn.linalg package

Submodules

pyttn.linalg.sparseMatrixExt module

pyttn.linalg.tensorExt module

pyttn.linalg.tensorExt.matrix(M)[source]

A function for converting from a numpy array to a C++ linalg::tensor<T,2> type used by the C++ layer of pyTTN.

Parameters:

M (np.ndarray) – The numpy matrix

Returns:

A pybind11 wrapped linalg::tensor<T, 2> object

Return type:

matrix_real, matrix_complex

pyttn.linalg.tensorExt.tensor(T)[source]

A function for converting from a numpy array to a C++ linalg::tensor<T,D> type for D<=4 used by the C++ layer of pyTTN.

Parameters:

M (np.ndarray) – The numpy tensor

Returns:

A pybind11 wrapped linalg::tensor<T, D> object

Return type:

pybind11 wrapped linalg::tensor<T,D> object

pyttn.linalg.tensorExt.vector(v)[source]

A function for converting from a 1 dimensional numpy array to a C++ linalg::tensor<T,1> type used by the C++ layer of pyTTN.

Parameters:

M (np.ndarray) – The numpy array

Returns:

A pybind11 wrapped linalg::tensor<T, 1> object

Return type:

vector_real, vector_complex

Module contents

pyttn.linalg.matrix(M)[source]

A function for converting from a numpy array to a C++ linalg::tensor<T,2> type used by the C++ layer of pyTTN.

Parameters:

M (np.ndarray) – The numpy matrix

Returns:

A pybind11 wrapped linalg::tensor<T, 2> object

Return type:

pyttn.linalg.tensor(T)[source]

A function for converting from a numpy array to a C++ linalg::tensor<T,D> type for D<=4 used by the C++ layer of pyTTN.

Parameters:

M (np.ndarray) – The numpy tensor

Returns:

A pybind11 wrapped linalg::tensor<T, D> object

Return type:

pybind11 wrapped linalg::tensor<T,D> object

A function for converting from a 1 dimensional numpy array to a C++ linalg::tensor<T,1> type used by the C++ layer of pyTTN.
